OEAPIINITCOM Namespace Reference


Classes

interface  IOEAPIInit
interface  IOEAPIInitState
interface  IOEIdentity
interface  IOEInitEvents
class  OEAPIInit
class  OEAPIInitState
class  OEIdentity

Detailed Description

It contains the OEAPIInit ActiveX object that triggers the event OnInitOEAPI when the OE starts running and the event OnShutdownOEAPI when OE shutdowns. Between these 2 events you can instance any object of OEAPI library without launching OE.
BINARY: oeapiinitcom.dll



Developed by Nektra
